scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && documentation build -f 'html' -g -o docs/ src/*.js
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.dist: browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone mostProxy --exclude most --outfile dist/most-proxy.js
scripts.preversion: npm run docs && git add docs/ && git commit -m 'chore(): build docs/' && npm run dist && git add dist/ && git commit -m 'chore(): build dist/'
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && release patch && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && release minor && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && release major && npm publish --access=public
